name: Use and possession of mortgaged property
text: §506-5  Use and possession of mortgaged property.  In the absence of an agreement to the contrary, the mortgagor of real property or fixtures under a duly recorded mortgage is entitled to the use or possession thereof until default. [L 1939, c 131, §1; RL 1945, §8879; RL 1955, §196-9; ren and am L 1966, c 18, §5(f); HRS §506-5]
